altername_name: La Leyenda de Spyro: La Fuerza del Dragon
name: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon
overview: Take flight anywhere in the Spyro Universe and engage in aerial combat Drop-in/Drop-out, 2 player Co-op with Cynder as a playable character Scale and epic challenge of bosses and multiple enemies Powerful action Features the voices of Elijah Wood, Gary Oldman, Christina Ricci and more
